column2: Fights the Dread King of Darkness.
Submits to the Dread King of Darkness.
Unlocks additional Council power laws\nEnables use of §YRealm Peace§!
May not have had a donation offer refused within the last 5 years.
See what options lie before you.
May not have extorted your subjects within the last six months.
Doing this is viewed as tyrannical, and will lower all of your subjects' opinion of you by §R-10§!.\n
Your liege receives a donation offer from you.\n
Council members can join factions freely\n
Council members may only join factions when the Council is §RDiscontent§!\nNomad and tribal Council members can always join factions
This character will owe you a §YFavor§!.
§Y[target_unlanded_friend.GetFirstName]'s§! opinion of all your §YDynasty Members§! changes by §G50§! §Y(Loyal Servant)§!\n
\nDisables the Advisor minor titles for Kings and Emperors\n
\nEnables the Advisor minor titles for Kings and Emperors.\n
Women related to the ruler are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]\n
Women related to the ruler are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]\n
Women related to the ruler are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]\n
Women related to the ruler are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]\n
Women are no longer allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]\n
Women are no longer allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]\n
Women are no longer allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]\n
Women are no longer allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]\n
§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! brings together a band of soldiers and starts to look for employment.
Has amassed a suitably large amount of money for [This.GetHerHis] realm: 300¤if ruling a County, 500¤if ruling a Duchy, 700¤if ruling a Kingdom or 1000¤if ruling an Empire.
Acquire a county for your daughter.
Acquire a county for your son.
Disallows additional succession laws\nVassals may refuse liege interference in wars\n
Allows additional succession laws\nVassals who refuse liege interference in wars are seen as traitors\n
As your character does not have a tyrannical personality, this action may affect you negatively.\n
